Detailed Description

Provided during a Grid Ajax save data event and contains the data modified by the user in the grid.

This class has a reference to the XML Document that contains the updates by the user. When accessing the rows of data that has been changed, this class returns new instances on the XmlDataRow class, which wraps the XmlElement for the given row.
